description.value:
As a reaction to one of your allies being reduced to 0 hit points or killed, you can force the creature responsible to make a Wisdom (Save) Check versus your spell save DC. On a failure, the creature is overcome with grief, surprise, or some other unexpected emotion, and is @Compendium[undertaking.conditions.3CQC3JEY2C3Y721F]{Incapacitated} until the start of its next turn.
    If your ally was killed instantly, the creature has disadvantage on the save.

system.requirements: Must have the Bard Starter Abilities
